measurements.description: Thirty one flat flowers on one branched, arched, 77-cm inflorescence; dorsal sepal pink faintly stippled darker pink; lateral sepals pink, stippled dark rose basally; petals pink, flushed darker pink centrally; lip cream, callus yellow, stippled darker rose, side lobes spotted and barred maroon, midlobe dark pink, darker pink speckles; column and anther cap pink; substance medium; texture crystalline.
